name: Don't Let Cthulhu Wake Up!
description:
Don't Let Cthulhu Wake Up!

This game was created in 2018/2 Ceet Game Jam. 

Objective
  • Destroy all evil acolytes trying to wake Cthulhu.
Rules
  • All acolytes have a time bar, you need to destroy them before the bar disappear(reaches to zero).
  • The movement is grid based.
  • The acolytes move when you move, but they walk randomly in the map.
  • You cannot attack when you throw your sword.
  • You need to get your sword back to be able to attack again.
Commands
  • F - Attack
  • G - Throw Sword
